    public class JmxServerProbe
extends Object
implements ServerProbe

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JmxServerProbe(String host)
      Creates a NodeProbe using the specified JMX host and default port.
      JmxServerProbe(String host, int port)
      Creates a ServerProbe using the specified JMX host and port.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JmxServerProbe

        public JmxServerProbe(String host,
              int port)
               throws IOException,
                      InterruptedException
        Creates a ServerProbe using the specified JMX host and port.
        Parameters:
        host - hostname or IP address of the JMX agent
        port - TCP port of the remote JMX agent
        Throws:
        IOException - on connection failures
        InterruptedException

      • JmxServerProbe

               throws IOException,
                      InterruptedException
        Creates a NodeProbe using the specified JMX host and default port.
        Parameters:
        host - hostname or IP address of the JMX agent
        Throws:
        IOException - on connection failures
        InterruptedException
